title: Introducing the React Foundation: The New Home for React & React Native
description:
Meta open-sourced React over a decade ago to help developers build better user experiences. Since then, React has grown into one of the worldâ€™s most popular open source projects, powering over 50 million websites and products built by companies such as Microsoft, Shopify, Bloomberg, Discord, Coinbase, the NFL, and many others. With React Native, React [...]
